Header.title: TOTAL eBIZ LLC
Header.paragraph: Your Trusted Partner for Cutting-Edge Electronic Data Interchange (EDI), SAP and Artificial Intelligence (AI) Consulting and Staffing Solutions.

About.paragraph: Welcome to TOTAL eBIZ LLC, a trusted partner in providing specialized IBM Sterling B2B products installation, configuration, support, and training. With our extensive experience and dedication to delivering tailored solutions, we help clients streamline their electronic data interchange (EDI) and artificial intelligence (AI) operations and optimize their business processes. TOTAL eBIZ LLC, is also a trusted recruitment partner for technology top-tier staffing solutions. With a focus on delivering exceptional talent and comprehensive services, we help our clients meet their business objectives and overcome their talent challenges.

Services.name: EDI Consulting
Services.text: Bespoke IBM Sterling B2B Products Installation and Configuration, Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) Integration Services, Enterprise Application Integration (EAI)

Services.name: Staffing Solutions
Services.text: Talent Acquisition Partnership, Permanent Recruitment, Contract and Contingent Staffing, Executive Search, Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO), Global Recruitment and Mobility

Services.name: Support
Services.text: EDI Integration Services Support, AI Automation Solutions, Service Level Agreement (SLA), Onsite or Remote Help Desk Support

Features.title: Consultancy
Features.text: In the realm of technology consulting, TOTAL eBIZ LLC excels in providing Managed Services and Outsourcing solutions.

Features.title: Recruitment

Features.title: Support
Features.text: With a strong emphasis on service quality and performance, we deliver exceptional support through service level agreement (SLA) and support options..
